summary: A handcrafted wooden cabin nestled in the heart of nature, designed for serene weekend getaways. The project emphasizes sustainable materials and minimalist design, offering a perfect blend of comfort and simplicity.

A modern wooden villa perched on a scenic hilltop, designed to maximize natural light and air circulation. With floor-to-ceiling glass panels and timber interiors, this project combines luxury with nature.

Inspired by traditional South Indian architecture, this lakeside home uses native materials and craftsmanship to create a timeless look. Carved wooden pillars, copper detailing, and a bamboo ceiling make this a cultural standout.
